channel.title: Comments for page "Money For Nothing"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Money For Nothing"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Does anyone have more clarity on this matter? Wanting to know where to spend my ryo to get this. If anyone knows, that'd be nice.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: hmmm, this season i have 150k in PW, 250k in jackpot and 100k in lottery (total 501350) and still won't be getting it, so either one of those 3 doesn't count or the requirement has changed in the recode…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Actually getting it doesn't bother me much (most of my money comes from emo anyway) but i was a bit annoyed that i should have and didn't.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wait, you are S3 and you don't have Money for Nothing yet?

I'm pretty sure that PW, Jackpot and Lottery counts for M4N. Not sure about Tsukiballs though.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Well, since there is nothing to say which ones count toward it, I had assumed that the games which record how much is spent were the ones that count…it was 300,200 on the wheel, 137,250 on Jackpot and 100,800 on Tsukiball, with the rest on the lottery. So if that helps figure out which ones count it would be good to have that somewhere on here.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
It is correct. Maybe your computation got mixed up somewhere. Some PH games don't count for M4N so maybe you added those games. Your computation will be helpful so we can see what's wrong.

And you should have checked your Looping Page before you looped. It is stated there what theme's you will get,

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I Looped today with (according to recorded amounts) 572,120 ryo spent in party house and didn't recieve it. So I want to check if this site is wrong or if I should BR it.
